project_descr: The Project aims to reduce the annual growth rate of GHG emissions by displacing the use of fossil fuels and the usage of good quality soil for brick making through the increased production, sale and utilization of non-fired bricks in Viet Nam.

outputs.output_descr: The Project aims to reduce the annual growth rate of GHG emissions by displacing the use of fossil fuels and the usage of good quality soil for brick making through the increased production, sale and utilization of non-fired bricks (NFBs) in Viet Nam.

document_name: Promotion of NFB Production and Usage in Viet Nam
01 international consultant in Non-Fired Brick (NFB) Construction Training to provide technical assistance to develop and implement the NFB training program
Awareness raising and Communication strategy and plan for Promotion of NFB Production and Utilization in Viet Nam
Energy efficiency and GHG emission Standards for NFB production
Technical support for implementation of mandatory product certifications for 3 Non-Fired Brick production projects
Two international consultants to provide technical assistance to develop and implement the NFB training program
project_title: promotion of non-fired brick production and utilization
